AdeptusMechanicus.BackstoryDef.title: architect
AdeptusMechanicus.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] designed and constructed buildings. On [PAWN_possessive] glitterworld home, most of the technical aspects of architecture were handled by an AI. This enabled [PAWN_objective] to push the artistic limits of the craft, but also meant [PAWN_pronoun] never had to get [PAWN_possessive] hands dirty at building sites.

AdeptusMechanicus.BackstoryDef.title: Hive Smith
AdeptusMechanicus.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the untold billions of menial, unaugmented human labourers of the Mechanicus, used primarily for unskilled labour too complex for Servitors to economically perform. Indoctrinated with the beliefs of the Cult Mechanicus in a simplified form [PAWN_nameDef] worked on reducing materials down to their base components for reforging.
